After being forced to abandon his post, Elijah Kane (Steven Seagal) returns to work for the government. Aware of his skill as a shooter, Kane is recruited by Marcus Mitchell (Adrian Holmes) to act as a CIA agent. Their mission aims to keep close enough to shoot at a target, which will only know the identity on time. For this operation, Kane rookie Mark Simms (Lochlyn Munro), Johnny Garcia (Jesse Hutch), and Jessica Finch (Tanaya Beatty) forming a new CIA team. All three agents are trained by Kane and also driven by more than business but also for personal reasons.
